Title: Time FootnoteÂ·XIII
Text:
Annalika called out the waste after looking at my metric record.
Perhaps in her opinion, the only way to realize the true value of ancient objects is to incorporate them into the Condensed Abyss Tower.
If possible, I really hope that this little girl can step out of the Condensed Abyss Tower and experience the real world, and become part of the footnotes of history along with all the metrics.
